channel.title: Play on zed tan
channel.description: Recent content in Play on zed tan

item.title: What I Learned From Being a First-time Dungeon Master
item.description: Over the new year, a few close friends and I huddled over alcohol (much needed), cakies (cake-ish cookies; thanks✨), an iPad, paper, and dice to play our first Dungeons and Dragons game. I was volunteered as the first dungeon master (DM, for virtue-signalling). So naturally, I took the basic rules and mangled them to produce a Pokémon-flavoured Dungeons and Dragons game. You can see some of the results here: https://axiomatic-coal.

item.title: Araki's Flowers
item.description: Fig. 1 Araki’s wedding photograph (left); Photograph of Yoko, Araki’s wife (right).(All pictures — unless stated otherwise — are photographs here are photographs of: Fuyumi, Namioka and Bernasconi, Francesca (eds.). Araki: Love and Death. Lugano: SilvanaEditoriale; Museo d’Arte: della Città di Lugano, 2004. I blame limited student resources and a then-pressing need to just get the assignment done) (This essay was written sometime in the third quarter of 2012.
